attributes.action: bring in tougher sentences for drink drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: drink drivers injure,maim and kill people every year.the courts seem to have lost contact with the sentences so the government should bring in mandatory sentences.i would like to see much harsher sentences introduced starting with a ban,fine and a prison sentence. the people injured by drink drivers end up with a lifetime sentence of pain and hardship whilst the offenders get back to a normal life

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
